title: Didn't receive Hextech chest
body: I just got lucian level 5 mastery and i did not receive anything. Is this a bug or are you not meant to get a chest.

replies.body: I just got an S+ with Soraka and didn't get a chest. My friend got one but I can't seem to find mine.

Do you own Soraka or were you playing her from the ftp rotation? Presently only games where you earn mastery points are eligible. This means that TT, ARAM, bots and playing a champ you don't own will NOT reward you with a chest, even if you or someone in your premade get an S.

Hey there,

You don't currently receive a chest for earning level 5 mastery with champs as far as I'm aware.

The current method of earning chests require you (Or a friend)  to get S, S- or S+ rank in a game.
